item.title: Asia Pacific accounts for half of all card spending
item.description:
New data from Euromonitor International reveals that global consumer reliance on card payments increased from 2014 to 2015, with the Asia Pacific region leading this trend. By 2015, the Asia Pacific region accounted for half of all card spending. This growth is projected to continue, with the region comprising 54% of the estimated US$29.2 trillion global card payment value by 2020. China’s favorable regulations for card and electronic payments have greatly contributed to this surge...
